content: The user is looking for an American-style restaurant in San Jose and then requests the address and contact information. They want to make a booking for 11:30 am on the 4th of the month for this restaurant.

The user is looking for a place to eat in San Mateo, specifically for lobster, and inquires about phone numbers, live music, and liquor availability. They ask for additional suggestions and decide to make a reservation at 5:30 PM on March 14th.
The user requested the weather for San Jose on March 7th and asked for rock songs similar to Brunettes Shoot Blondes in the Bittersweet album, with a preference to play them on iTunes.

The user inquired about the weather in London on May 1st, including humidity and wind conditions. They then requested help finding a house for one person, arriving on the 1st and checking out on the 4th. They also asked if there is air conditioning in the house.

The user requested to play "Let Me Love You" by Ariana Grande, and wanted to transfer $970 from their savings account to Tom. They also expressed interest in watching non-fiction movies, mentioning a liking for JT Leroy.

The user wants to play Nick Murphy's song "No Diggity". They also want to transfer $1030 to Jerry using their savings account. Additionally, they are looking to stream an adventure movie directed by Anna Boden and express interest in watching "Captain Marvel."

The user wants to cast the song "Music Never Sleeps" by Jason Chen on iTunes. They also want to transfer $1150 from their savings account to Pranav. Additionally, they are interested in a fantasy movie online, particularly one directed by George Miller, and decide on "Mad Max."

The user wants to listen to the song "Stitches" in their bedroom. They also request a transfer of $980 from their savings account to Abhinav. Additionally, they want to watch the movie "Dogman" and ask about its genre.

The user is looking for attractions to visit in San Francisco, specifically a museum and an IMAX movie. They are also interested in finding a romance movie to watch online, mentioning "Say Anything" and asking about its director.
The user wants to find a garden to visit in San Francisco. They are also interested in the fantasy movie "Alice in Wonderland" by Tim Burton and want to play the song "Dumbo" now.
The user wants to visit a free museum in San Francisco. They also want to watch the movie "Hackers" online with subtitles, which is a drama, and are curious about the director.

The user requested help finding comic movies online, expressed interest in "Dr. Strangelove". They also inquired about the movie's director. Later, they asked to make a reservation at Taste of India in Fremont for 11 AM.

The user wants to watch the drama movie "The Dogman" online. They also want to make a reservation for four people at 5:30 pm in San Francisco, preferably at Aato, and inquire about its pricing and liquor options.
The user is looking for the fantasy movie "Hellboy" and asks for the director's name. They also want to make a reservation at The Cantina in Mill Valley for 11:30.

The user is looking for adventure movies directed by Ronald Neame, specifically mentioning "The Poseidon Adventure" as a good choice. They also want to book a restaurant in Santa Rosa for three people on the 4th of the month at 6:30 PM at Union, asking if the restaurant serves liquor and pasta.

The user wants to find an Izakaya restaurant in San Francisco and make a reservation for two people at 5:45 PM on the 5th of this month at 2g Japanese Brasserie. They also request to add this reservation to their calendar.

The user requested help finding a seafood restaurant in San Francisco with live music, asked for its location, and inquired about making a reservation for 11:30 AM. They confirmed the restaurant Akiko's Sushi Bar. They also requested adding the reservation to their calendar with the event title "Restaurant reservation at Akiko's Sushi Bar."

The user is looking for a Parisian restaurant in Ross with live music. They requested to book a table for two at 11:30 AM and asked to add the reservation to their calendar at 11:15 AM, naming the event "Restaurant reservation for 5 at Marche Aux Fleurs."

The user is looking for an Indian restaurant in Livermore to dine with friends. They want to book a table for four people on March 3rd at 6:45 PM. They also want to add the reservation to their calendar under the name "Food."

The user is looking for a good, bargain-priced Chinese restaurant in San Francisco or Santa Rosa. They want to book a table for six people at Mei-Don Chinese Cuisine at 7 PM, and add the reservation to their calendar with the event title "Restaurant Reservation."
